en.aboutDesc: Six years ago, I wasn't a sporty person. I was lazy, dissatisfied with my own physique. I was once bullied because of my body type, and I didn't want to be called "fat" anymore.So, I stepped into the gym. During the process, I slowly saw the change in my physique and also discovered my passion for fitness. I then embarked on the path of bodybuilding and became the youngest IFBB Pro in Taiwan in 2022.

competitive.title: Amateur
accomplishments: I did 24 Amatuer bodybuilding shows in total Participated in Men's Physique, Classic Physique and Bodybuilding divisions.

competitive.title: Professional
accomplishments: Earned my IFBB Pro card in NPC Taiwan Pro Qualifier.
IFBB Pro League TAIWAN PRO 5th Place

It has survived not only five centuries, but also the leap into electronic typesetting, remaining essentially unchanged.

features: Present your own physique strength & hide weaknesses

en.pricingInfo: Long-term commitment allows for monitoring, successful foster workout routine, and effective physique trans formation.Recommend starting from 2-3 months.
